typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Airport_Code as string,
		Airport_Name as string,
		Time_Label as string,
		Time_Month as string,
		Time_Month_Name as string,
		Time_Year as string,
		{Statistics_#_of_Delays_Carrier} as string,
		{Statistics_#_of_Delays_Late_Aircraft} as string,
		{Statistics_#_of_Delays_National_Aviation_System} as string,
		{Statistics_#_of_Delays_Security} as string,
		{Statistics_#_of_Delays_Weather} as string,
		Statistics_Carriers_Names as string,
		Statistics_Carriers_Total as string,
		Statistics_Flights_Cancelled as string,
		Statistics_Flights_Delayed as string,
		Statistics_Flights_Diverted as string,
		Statistics_Flights_On_Time as string,
		Statistics_Flights_Total as string,
		Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Carrier as string,
		Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Late_Aircraft as string,
		Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_National_Aviation_System as string,
		Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Security as string,
		Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Total as string,
		Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Weather as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AirlineMain
source(output(
		Idairline as integer,
		airlinename as string,
		airlinecode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimAirline
AirlineMain, DimAirline lookup(Airport_Code == airlinecode,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupAirline
LookupAirline sink(input(
		IdDelayTime as integer,
		Time_Month as string,
		Time_Year as string,
		IdAirline as integer,
		numCarrier as integer,
		numLateAircraft as integer,
		numNAS as integer,
		numSecurity as integer,
		numTotalDealyTime as integer,
		numWeather as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Time_Month,
		Time_Year,
		IdAirline = Idairline,
		numCarrier = Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Carrier,
		numLateAircraft = Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Late_Aircraft,
		numNAS = Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_National_Aviation_System,
		numSecurity = Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Security,
		numWeather = Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Weather,
		numTotalDealyTime = Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Total
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> fctDelayTime
